thread.title: Home Eagles Get $2,000 Each For Burkina Faso Draw
thread.title_full: Home Eagles Get $2,000 Each For Burkina Faso Draw

author: Prince Imehiron
title: Home Eagles Get $2,000 Each For Burkina Faso Draw
text:
Headlines / Home Eagles Get $2,000 Each For Burkina Faso Draw Home Eagles Get $2,000 Each For Burkina Faso Draw Headlines , Top Stories 
By Adeboye Amosu, who was in Ouagadougou: 
Each member of the home-based Super Eagles side was paid $2,000 as bonus for the draw against Burkina Faso, Compleportsnigeria.com can report. 
The team qualified for the African Nations Championships 2-0 on aggregate following a 0-0 draw against Burkina Faso in Ouagadougou on Sunday. 
The Super Eagles were also paid $2,000 as bonus for the 2-0 win in the first leg in Port Harcourt. The team returned to Abuja at around 1am Monday morning. 
Meanwhile, Abia Warriors centre-back Austine Oboroakpo was picked by the local media as the best Eagles player Oboroakpo was excellent throughout the game and impressed the Burkinabe journalists into voting him as Nigeria's man of the match.
